Bash("/c/Users/trg16/AppData/Local/Python/pythoncore-3.14-64/python.exe" -c "
import json
with open\(''C:/Users/trg16/.claude/.credentials.json'', ''r''\) as f:
    data = json.load\(f\)
# Print the keys only first to understand structure
print\(''Top-level keys:'', list\(data.keys\(\)\)\)
for k, v in data.items\(\):
    if isinstance\(v, dict\):
        print\(f''  {k} keys: {list\(v.keys\(\)\)}''\)
    elif isinstance\(v, str\):
        print\(f''  {k}: {v[:20]}...{v[-10:]}'' if len\(v\) > 30 else f''  {k}: {v}''\)
    else:
        print\(f''  {k}: {type\(v\).__name__}''\)
")

Bash("/c/Users/trg16/AppData/Local/Python/pythoncore-3.14-64/python.exe" -c "
import json, subprocess, datetime

with open\(''C:/Users/trg16/.claude/.credentials.json'', ''r''\) as f:
    data = json.load\(f\)

oauth = data[''claudeAiOauth'']
print\(''Token prefix:'', oauth[''accessToken''][:12] + ''...''\)
print\(''Expires at:'', oauth[''expiresAt'']\)
print\(''Scopes:'', oauth.get\(''scopes''\)\)
print\(''Subscription:'', oauth.get\(''subscriptionType''\)\)
print\(''Rate limit tier:'', oauth.get\(''rateLimitTier''\)\)

# Check if expired
expires = oauth[''expiresAt'']
print\(f''Expiry raw value: {expires}''\)
")
